name: Demon Zombie Outpost
description:
Demon Zombie Outpost is a 60 + kills 1 level game theres 2 different Demon Zombies & 2 different Soldier Zombies you start by a weapon stash you have 5 weapons Mk19T Tactical Magnum R870 Tactical Shotgun Mk18 Assault Rifle Chainsaw (these 4 weapons are from the GameGuru Enhanced Weapon pack) & you have Grenades grenades & health pickups are placed next to some of the bunker entrances.There are no objectives JUST KILL ALL THE ZOMBIES !

Demon Zombie Outpost short story : Your military outpost was overrun by a large demon zombie horde that broke through the outpost gate entrance everyone in your unit was turned into a regular zombie you managed to close the outpost gate now you have to kill all the zombies in the outpost !

TECHNICAL STUFF :

To make the game play in your displays resolution press Alt + Enter while playing then quit & restart you should see the difference.


KMB Controls
Left Mouse = Shoot
Right Mouse = Aim
W = Move Forward
S = Move Backward
A = Move Left
D = Move Right
E = Interact (Pickup Item)
Left Shift = Run
Left Alt = Melee
V = Change fire mode for Mk18
C = Crouch
Spacebar = Jump
1 2 3 4 5 Keyboard keys = Weapon Select
Mouse Wheel = Weapon Select
